**What is our privacy policy?**

Our company was founded by two former Deputy District Attorneys who take privacy and security very seriously. We know that protecting member privacy is essential to our success. Please take the time to review our complete [Privacy Agreement](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/privacy-policy-360002101688).

**How secure is my credit card information?**

We comply with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard with respect to the environments we use to process, store and transmit payment card information to ensure your credit card information is processed securely.

**Are my transactions with you secure?**

Yes. We endeavor to work only with stores providing high levels of security and using Secure Socket Layer (SSL) Internet connections to protect the integrity of your transaction.

**Will you sell information about me or my purchase habits?**

No. For more detailed information, please review our [privacy policy](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/privacy-policy-360002101688).

**What are "cookies" and how do I enable them?**

Cookies are simply text files that allow a site to recognize you when you return. This means you don’t have to log in again and again. Cookies used by Rakuten and our network of stores are completely safe, and they are enabled by default with most browsers.

**Will I start receiving "spam" if I join?**

No. We send two types of emails to our members: member-services emails required to maintain the program (such as Cash Back credits and payment notifications) and promotional emails featuring especially good offers. You may choose not to receive promotional emails at any time from your account page or by clicking the "unsubscribe" link in an email. We will not sell your information to any third party.

You can earn Cash Back shopping in person at select stores, just like you do online.

Here’s how to get started with earning In-Store Cash Back:

1.  **Link a credit card to your Account.**
    
    [Link a card in your Account](https://www.rakuten.com/my-wallet.htm). You can earn in-store Cash Back with Visa, Mastercard and American Express.
    
2.  **Add the offer to your card.**
    
    Offers can only be used on a single purchase and are usually active for 45 days. Make sure to check offer details to see when the offer expires. The offer must be added to your linked credit card before making a purchase.
    
3.  **Go to the store and shop!**
    
    In-store Cash Back is only available for physical purchases made at the store. If you place an online purchase and pick up in-store, you will not earn in-store Cash Back.
    
4.  **Pay with your linked card to earn Cash Back.**
    
    Use your linked card when you’re purchasing in store.
    

**Debit cards MUST be run as credit to earn Cash Back in store.**

**Tips for maximizing your In-Store Cash Back:**

*   Re-add offers after you shop. Added offers are valid for one purchase only.
*   Use the App to add an offer while you’re in the store. You can also add Dining offers exclusively in the App. [Learn more about Dining](https://www.rakuten.com/dining)
*   Make sure push notifications are turned on in the App so you know about in-store Cash Back deals near you.

**Getting your In-Store Cash Back**

Cash Back will be added to your account after the store confirms your purchase. The time it takes for Cash Back to be confirmed depends on several factors, including the store, store policy, reporting schedule, exclusions and returns.

**Card safety and security**

We take your privacy and security very seriously. Your credit card data is safely stored in a secure, encrypted environment that has been certified as compliant by the Payment Card Industry Security Standards Council (PCI). You can learn more about PCI compliance at [https://www.pcisecuritystandards.org](https://www.pcisecuritystandards.org/). For more information on how Rakuten handles your private information, please see our main [Privacy Policy](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/privacy-policy-115009657667) and the [In-Store Cash Back Terms & Conditions](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/in-store-cash-back-terms-conditions-115013738007).

In-Store Cash Back works by letting you link Cash Back offers to a credit card. Any card information you share with Rakuten is held in a secure, encrypted environment and will never be exposed, sold or otherwise compromised.

[Read our In-Store Cash Back Terms & Conditions](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/terms-conditions-360002101608) 

**Qualifying In-Store Cash Back cards**

You can link most American Express cards, most Mastercard credit and debit cards, and most Visa credit and debit cards to your Rakuten account. In-Store Cash Back offers cannot currently be linked to other cards, including store cards that do not carry American Express, Mastercard or Visa logos. If you shop with more than one card, feel free to link multiple cards to your account.

**Special instructions for debit cards**

To earn In-Store Cash Back with your debit card, be sure to run it as credit and sign for your purchase, instead of using your PIN. Rakuten will not be notified of PIN transactions, so you will not earn Cash Back for those.

**Adding a card to the In-Store Cash Back program**

1.  [Sign in](https://www.rakuten.com/my-account.htm) to your Rakuten account
2.  Under “My Account,” click on “My Wallet”
3.  Click on “Add a New Card” and enter the credit and debit cards you’d like to shop with

After your card is successfully added to your Rakuten account, simply visit the In-Store Cash Back section of Rakuten to link to offers from your favorite stores. Then you’re ready to go shopping.

**Removing a Card from the program**

If for any reason you would like to stop participating in the In-Store Cash Back program, simply remove your card(s) from your Rakuten account, following these steps:

1.  [Sign in](https://www.rakuten.com/my-account.htm) to your Rakuten account
2.  Under “My Account,” click on “My Wallet”
3.  Click “Remove” next to the card you’d like to remove

[Learn How In-Store Cash Back works](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/how-in-store-cash-back-works-360002117467) 

[See Our In-Store Cash Back Offers](https://www.rakuten.com/in-store.htm)

To sign in to [your Account](https://www.rakuten.com/my-account.htm), enter the email address and password you used to join. If you were not asked to add a password to your account when you joined, you should have received an email with instructions on how to create a password.

**Passwords**

Passwords must contain at least 8 characters, including a letter and a number or special character. To set your password or create a new password, go to [Reset My Password](https://www.rakuten.com/help/password) and enter the email address you used to join.

There are two ways to receive your Cash Back payments:

*   Big Fat Check
*   PayPal payment

Either method you choose is completely free. Payments are sent every three months on our [payment schedule](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/when-will-i-get-paid-360002117667). 

**Big Fat Check**

If you opt for a Big Fat Check, you will receive a check issued to the name and address in your [Account Settings](https://www.rakuten.com/account-settings.htm) (or “Choose How to Get Paid” in the App).

**PayPal**

Payments can be sent to the PayPal account of your choice. You’ll be asked for verification when you select this method or update your PayPal email address. For more information about PayPal verification, please visit [PayPal](https://www.paypal.com/).

If you choose to receive a PayPal payment, your payment will be issued to the account associated with the PayPal email address in your [Account Settings](https://www.rakuten.com/account-settings.htm) (or “Choose How to Get Paid” in the App).

[Track My Payment](https://www.rakuten.com/help/track-big-fat-check)

****Cash Back for Change****

Your Big Fat Check can make a big impact! With our Cash Back for Change program, you can donate the change from your quarterly Cash Back payment to our partner nonprofits. Members who get paid via PayPal or check are eligible to participate. All you need to do is [opt in](https://www.rakuten.com/cash-back-for-change) to start giving back.

Learn more about [Cash Back for Change](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/donating-part-of-your-big-fat-check-to-cash-back-for-change-360058672214)

It’s easy! Once you have the Cash Back Button installed to your browser, just head to the site you want to shop. The Button will automatically notify you if Cash Back is available. Select Activate Cash Back and that’s it!

You can also activate Cash Back by selecting the Cash Back Button icon in your browser’s toolbar. Whatever way you choose, we’ll confirm that Cash Back has been activated so you know everything is working.

The color of the Button icon in your browser’s toolbar tells you if Cash Back is available or activated:

*   Purple - The site doesn’t offer Cash Back.

*   Red - Cash Back is available. Select the icon, then select Activate Cash Back.

*   Blue - You’ve activated Cash Back.

**More features**

In addition to finding and activating Cash Back, the Button will also search for the lowest price on a specific product and let you know if we find one. And if the store you’re shopping doesn’t offer Cash Back, we’ll let you know if there’s a similar store that does.

Select the icon in your browser’s toolbar to see coupons and deals for the site you’re visiting, or to get a snapshot of your account, including how much Cash Back you’ve earned.

**Cash Back Activated confirmations**

When you activate Cash Back through the Button, you’ll see a confirmation that a Rakuten Shopping Trip has started. If you don’t see a confirmation, Cash Back wasn’t activated. This might be because some stores don’t allow notifications on their site, or they don’t offer Cash Back through the Button.

If this happens, try these fixes:

*   If the Button icon in your browser’s toolbar is flashing red, select the icon, then select Activate Cash Back. When the icon turns blue, you’ve activated Cash Back and you’re ready to shop!

*   Go to rakuten.com and search for the site you’re shopping to start a Rakuten Shopping Trip.

**Activate at every visit**

Be sure to activate the Cash Back Button every time you visit a site. If you make two separate purchases on the same site, you’ll need to activate Cash Back through the Button both times to get Cash Back. Why? Rakuten works by getting a commission from stores for sending you their way, then sharing it with you as Cash Back. Activating Cash Back through the Button lets a store know you’re shopping through Rakuten.

[Installing the Rakuten Cash Back Button](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/installing-the-rakuten-cash-back-button-360002101128)

[What is the Rakuten Cash Back Button?](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/what-is-the-rakuten-cash-back-button-360002116947)

The Rakuten Cash Back Button is available for these browsers:

[Chrome](https://www.rakuten.com/button-landing/redirect.htm?utm=help_article)

[Edge](https://www.rakuten.com/button-landing/redirect.htm?utm=help_article)

[Firefox](https://www.rakuten.com/button-landing/redirect.htm?utm=help_article)

[Safari](https://www.rakuten.com/button-landing/redirect.htm?utm=help_article)

If you’re a Canadian resident, we encourage you to join [Rakuten.ca,](https://www.ebates.ca/) our Canadian site dedicated to bringing you the best Cash Back shopping experience.

**Benefits of becoming a Rakuten.ca member**

*   Big Fat Checks and PayPal payments are paid in Canadian dollars
*   All stores on Rakuten.ca are either based in Canada or have been verified to have Canada-friendly shipping policies

**Canadian shopping on Rakuten.com**

While Rakuten.ca stores all ship to Canadian addresses, some stores on Rakuten.com may not. If you’re a Canadian resident and decide to shop with Rakuten.com instead of Rakuten.ca, you'll want to verify that the stores you shop at will ship to Canada.

In addition, please be aware of the following currency conversion details:

*   Rakuten.com Cash Back Balances are displayed in U.S. dollars, not Canadian dollars
*   Orders reported to Rakuten.com in Canadian dollars are converted to U.S. dollars
*   Rakuten.com Big Fat Checks are paid in U.S. dollars, so check with your financial institution regarding policies, fees and currency conversion
*   Rakuten.com PayPal payments are converted to Canadian dollars; please see [PayPal’s User Agreement](https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/ua/useragreement-full) for more information

[Visit the Rakuten.ca Help Center](https://www.ebates.ca/help)

**eBay**

Why yes, you can earn Cash Back on your eBay orders! Just keep a few things in mind when shopping at eBay:

*   Cash Back at eBay depends on the category and sometimes the rates can change. You can always check the latest Cash Back rates on the [eBay store page.](https://www.rakuten.com/ebay)
*   Cash Back is only eligible on completed Winning Bid or Buy It Now transactions. An item must be paid for to earn Cash Back.
*   Limit of $50 Cash Back per order.

**Amazon**

As of March 2020, Cash Back is no longer available at Amazon. (We know, it’s a bummer.) The good news is, we have over 4,000 stores that do offer Cash Back, so you can definitely find a great deal and free, speedy shipping on anything imaginable!

When you use Rakuten to book airline, hotel, car or other travel reservations, please be aware that Cash Back will be earned after your trip is completed.

Cash Back with Rakuten is always earned after a purchase is completed. When you first book a trip or rental, the travel company considers that to be a reservation, even if your credit card has been billed. Once you’ve finished your trip and the company confirms payment, your reservation becomes a completed order and the company will let us know. Timing can vary a little, but you’ll usually see your (often pretty significant) Cash Back in My Account within 3 months of your trip.

All returns and cancellations are subject to each store’s specific policy. Returned or cancelled orders may void Cash Back and be deducted from your Cash Back Balance, depending on the store’s policy. If a store processes your exchanged order as a cancellation and a new transaction is created, the exchange may be treated as a cancelled order.

To ensure you receive Cash Back on exchanged orders, you can instead return the item and place an entirely new order at that store. Just make sure to start your shopping with Rakuten.

[Visit My Account](https://www.rakuten.com/my-account.htm)

[Learn More About Rakuten Shopping Trips](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/what-is-a-rakuten-shopping-trip-360002100588)

You can use Rakuten on Chrome, Firefox, Safari and Microsoft Edge. Make sure you have the latest version of your browser so Rakuten can work properly.

Third-party browsers are not guaranteed to work with Rakuten and may prevent you from earning Cash Back.

Rakuten uses cookies to improve our site, enhance your shopping experience and provide you with recommendations based on your browsing activity and interests on this and other sites. Be sure to allow cookies from rakuten.com in your browser’s Settings for the best Rakuten experience.

Want to earn points instead of Cash Back? Here’s everything you need to know.

**How do I start earning Membership Rewards points through Rakuten?**

New to Rakuten? [Sign Up](https://www.rakuten.com/american-express.htm) for a free account to start earning. When prompted, enter your American Express account username and password. Once your American Express account is connected, you’ll start earning Membership Rewards points when you shop through Rakuten.

Already have a Rakuten account? Go to [Account Settings](https://www.rakuten.com/account-settings.htm%20target=) and select Membership Rewards Points under How You Get Paid. Connect your American Express account by entering your user name and password and you’re all set!

Any confirmed Cash Back earned before switching to points will be converted to points and transferred on the next payment date.

You can only make the switch from Cash Back to points once. If you opt out of points later, you won’t be able to opt in again.

**How does the Membership Rewards points program work?**

Earning Membership Rewards points with Rakuten is simple:

1.  Start at Rakuten and choose a store. You can use our website, mobile app, or browser extension.
2.  Activate Cash Back to start shopping. You’ll still see Cash Back deals, but don’t worry, you’ll earn Membership Rewards points. Once you make an eligible purchase, we’ll add points to your Rakuten account.
3.  Get paid! Rakuten will transfer your confirmed Membership Rewards points every 3 months according to Rakuten’s current [Payment Schedule](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/getting-your-rakuten-cash-back-payments-360002117667).

$1 Cash Back = 100 Membership Rewards points.

**When will I get my Membership Rewards points?**

To get your American Express Membership Rewards® points, make sure you earn at least 501 confirmed points before the payment date. Points must be confirmed by the store before the payment date to be included in your points transfer. If your Earnings Balance is 500 points or less, it will carry over to the next payment date.

**Getting Paid**

Any confirmed points you earn on purchases, bonuses and other rewards will be transferred to your American Express account every three months. The time it takes for points to be confirmed depends on several factors, including the store, store policy, reporting schedule, exclusions and returns.

Rakuten Payment Dates:

*   February 15
*   May 15
*   August 15
*   November 15

**Earnings Balance**

Your Earnings Balance reflects your current earnings, including both pending and confirmed points. The time it takes for points to be confirmed depends on several factors, including the store, store policy, reporting schedule, exclusions and returns. For more details, go to [Earnings Balance](https://www.rakuten.com/pending-cash-back.htm).

Remember, your earnings on purchases, bonuses and other rewards need to be confirmed before the payment date to be included.

Want to track your payment? [Track My Big Fat Check](https://www.rakuten.com/help/track-big-fat-check)

**Is there a minimum points balance to get paid?**

Yes, you need minimum confirmed earnings of 501 points before the next payment date to get paid. Points must be confirmed by the store before the payment date to be included in your payment. If your Earnings Balance is 500 points or less, it will carry over to the next payment date.

**How do I know if my American Express card is eligible to participate?**

You must have an American Express Card enrolled in the U.S. Membership Rewards program. It must not be cancelled or past due. Here’s a list of [eligible cards](https://rewards.americanexpress.com/myca/loyalty/us/catalog/tandc?mrlinknav=footer-tandc%20target=). Corporate cards or accounts are not eligible to participate.

**How do I check my Membership Rewards points earnings in my Rakuten account?**

You can see your current earnings any time in [Earnings Balance](https://www.rakuten.com/pending-cash-back.htm).

**I have more questions. Who can I reach out to?**

[Contact Us](https://www.rakuten.com/help/other-questions) and we’ll be happy to help!

Please carefully read these Rakuten Cash Back for Change Program Terms and Conditions before opting into or otherwise using Cash Back for Change (also referred to herein as the "program"). These Rakuten Cash Back for Change Program Terms and Conditions, together with the [Rakuten.com Terms and Conditions](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/terms-conditions-360002101608) incorporated herein by reference, form a legally binding agreement (collectively, the "Agreement") that governs your participation in the Cash Back for Change program provided by Ebates Performance Marketing, Inc. dba Rakuten Rewards ("Rakuten," "we," or "us"). By clicking the "Start Donating Now," "Donate my change," or similar button (as applicable) or by toggling to activate the Cash Back for Change donations in your Account Settings, you acknowledge and accept the disclosures herein and agree to be bound by the Agreement. If you do not wish to be bound by the Agreement, do not click "Start Donating Now," "Donate my change," or similar buttons or toggle to activate the Cash Back for Change donations in your Account Settings.

1\. Participation in Cash Back for Change. Cash Back for Change is a program that allows Members who receive their Cash Back payments via PayPal or check to donate a portion of their Cash Back payments to charities that we select from time to time (the "Charities"). To participate in the program, you must receive your Cash Back payments via PayPal or check, and click the "Start Donating Now" or similar button on the [Cash Back for Change landing page](https://www.rakuten.com/cash-back-for-change). You may also opt in through your Account Settings. Under "Cash Back for Change" under your Account Settings, toggle on "Donate my change" to opt in. Your Account Settings and the Cash Back for Change landing page will indicate whether you are currently participating in the program. You may opt in to participate in Cash Back for Change at any time. To donate a portion of your next Cash Back payment and subsequent Cash Back payments, opt in by the first day of the calendar month of your next Cash Back payment. Otherwise, Cash Back for Change may not collect your donation from your next Cash Back payment. See the [Rakuten Payment Schedule](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/getting-your-rakuten-cash-back-payments-360002117667) for details.

2\. Disabling Cash Back for Change. After you have opted in to participate in Cash Back for Change, you can choose to opt out by clicking "opt out here" on the [Cash Back for Change landing page](https://www.rakuten.com/cash-back-for-change) or toggling off "Donate my change" in your Account Settings. To opt out of donating a portion of your next Cash Back payment and subsequent Cash Back payments, opt out by the first day of the calendar month of your next Cash Back payment. Otherwise, Cash Back for Change may collect your donation from your next Cash Back payment. See the [Rakuten Payment Schedule](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/getting-your-rakuten-cash-back-payments-360002117667) for details. You may opt in to Cash Back for Change again according to Section 1.

3\. Donations. Cash Back for Change automatically rounds down your Cash Back payments to the nearest dollar and donates the change to the Charities. The Cash Back payments will be reduced by the Cash Back for Change amount before payments are issued under the [Rakuten Payment Schedule](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/getting-your-rakuten-cash-back-payments-360002117667). You will receive the balance of your Cash Back payments through the payment delivery method you have selected.

4\. Charities. Our list of Charities that participate in Cash Back for Change is subject to change from time to time without notice to you. We have the sole discretion to add or delete Charities or otherwise change the list at any time without notice.

5\. Disbursements to Charities. You will have no further rights to any Cash Back for Change amounts once your Cash Back payment is reduced by this sum. These donations will be disbursed to the Charities in a manner and on a schedule determined by us in our sole discretion.

6\. Reporting for Charitable Tax Deduction. We are not required to provide (and you will not receive) any contemporaneous written acknowledgment of donations made through Cash Back for Change to support a charitable tax deduction on your personal income tax return. You may consult your tax advisor regarding the deductibility of any donation you make.

Yes! The mobile extension is available for the latest version of iOS Safari.

1.  Make sure you have the latest version of the Rakuten iOS App installed (the mobile extension comes bundled with the App).
2.  Open the Safari app on your mobile device.
3.  Tap the **aA** icon in the bottom left corner.
4.  Tap **Manage Extensions**.
5.  Turn on the toggle next to Rakuten. Tap **Done**.
6.  Review permissions by tapping **Review** on the top right.

If you’re not sure whether the Cash Back Button is working, or if it’s missing from your browser, try these fixes. You can also [contact us](https://www.rakuten.com/help/other-questions).

Chrome

**1\. Make sure you have the latest version of Chrome.**

To check, enter **chrome://settings/help** in the address bar and press return.

**2\. Try uninstalling and reinstalling the Cash Back Button.**

To **uninstall**, hold down the control key while you select the Button (or right-click on it), then select Remove from Chrome.

If you don’t see the Cash Back Button, enter **chrome://extensions/** in the address bar and press return. Find the Rakuten Button and select Remove.

To **reinstall**, visit the Chrome browser store. Select Add to Chrome to add the Cash Back Button to your Extensions. Select the puzzle piece icon in the upper-right corner to open your Extensions. Select the pin icon next to the Rakuten Button. You’ll now see it in your browser’s toolbar.

**3\. Re-enable the Button**

Your Button might not work if it’s been disabled by a browser update.

In the address bar, enter **chrome://extensions/** and press return. Find the Rakuten extension and select the slider to toggle it to the right. The extension is enabled when the slider is blue.

**4\. Restart Your Computer**

If you need more help, [contact us](https://www.rakuten.com/help/other-questions).

Edge

**1\. Make sure you have the latest version of Edge.**

To check, select the three dots for Settings and more in the upper-right corner, then select Settings. Scroll down to About Microsoft Edge to see if it’s up to date.

**2\. Try uninstalling and reinstalling the Cash Back Button.**

To **uninstall**, hold down the control key while you select the Button (or right-click on it), then select Remove from Microsoft Edge.

If you don’t see the Cash Back Button, select the three dots (Settings and more) in the upper-right corner and select Extensions. Find the Rakuten extension and select Remove.

To **reinstall**, visit the Edge browser store. Select Get to install the Cash Back Button. You’ll now see it in your browser’s toolbar.

**3\. Re-enable the Button**

Your Button might not work if it’s been disabled by a browser update.

Select the three dots (Settings and more) in the upper-right corner and select Extensions. Find the Rakuten extension and select the slider to toggle it to the right. The extension is enabled when the slider is blue.

**4\. Restart Your Computer**

If you need more help, [contact us](https://www.rakuten.com/help/other-questions).

Firefox

**1\. Make sure you have the latest version of Firefox.**

To check, enter **about:preferences** in the address bar and press return. Scroll down to Firefox Updates to see if it’s up to date.

**2\. Try uninstalling and reinstalling the Cash Back Button.**

To **uninstall**, enter about:addons in the address bar and press return. Select the three dots next to the Rakuten extension, then select Remove.

To **reinstall**, visit the Firefox browser store. Select Add to Firefox to install the Cash Back Button. You’ll now see it in your browser’s toolbar.

**3\. Re-enable the Button**

Your Button might not work if it’s been disabled by a browser update.

Enter **about:addons** in the address bar and press return. Find the Rakuten extension and select the slider to toggle it to the right. The extension is enabled when the slider is blue.

**4\. Restart Your Computer**

If you need more help, [contact us](https://www.rakuten.com/help/other-questions).

Safari

**1\. Make sure you have the latest version of Safari.**

To update Safari, install the most recent macOS update. This automatically includes the latest version of Safari.

**2\. Try uninstalling and reinstalling the Cash Back Button.**

To **uninstall**, select Safari at the left of the top menu bar. Select Preferences and go to the Extensions tab. Select the Rakuten extension from the menu on the left, then select Uninstall.

If a pop-up appears telling you to remove the Rakuten Cash Back application, select Show in Finder and make sure Safari is closed. In the folder that appears, drag Rakuten Cash Back into the Trash.

To **reinstall**, visit the Safari browser store. Select View to open the App Store. In the App Store, select Get to install Rakuten Cash Back, then select Open. You’ll now see it in your browser’s toolbar.

**3\. Re-enable the Button**

Your Button might not work if it’s been disabled by a browser update.

Select Safari at the left of the top menu bar. Select Preferences and go to the Extensions tab. Check the box next to Rakuten Cash Back in the menu on the left.

**4\. Restart Your Computer**

If you need more help, [contact us](https://www.rakuten.com/help/other-questions).

We encourage all stores to offer Cash Back through the Cash Back Button, but a small number of stores don’t participate fully or at all.

Some stores offer Cash Back but don’t allow the Button to show a notification on their site. In this case, you won’t see a reminder to activate Cash Back when shopping on that site but you can still activate Cash Back through the Button. If the Button icon in your browser’s toolbar is flashing red, select the icon, then select Activate Cash Back. When the icon turns blue, you’ve activated Cash Back and you’re ready to shop!

Other stores don't offer Cash Back at all through the Button, so you won’t be able to activate Cash Back directly on the site. You can always check [rakuten.com](https://www.rakuten.com/) to see if you can earn Cash Back by starting your shopping from the Rakuten website, instead of using the Button.

Don’t need Cash Back reminders when you’re shopping? No problem! The Cash Back Button offers 2 options for disabling them.

**Option 1: Disable for individual stores**

For certain stores, you can check the box next to Don’t show on (Store Name). You can still activate Cash Back any time you’re shopping by selecting the Button icon in your browser’s toolbar.

**Option 2: Disable for multiple stores**

To turn off reminders for multiple stores at once, follow these steps:

1.  Select the Button icon in your browser's toolbar.
2.  Select Settings at the bottom left of the drop-down that appears.
3.  Check the box next to Do not display Activation Hover on these sites.
4.  Enter the URLs of sites where you want to turn off Cash Back notifications.
5.  When you're done, select Save.

You can still activate Cash Back for these stores by selecting the Button icon in your browser's toolbar.

When the icon turns blue, Cash Back has been activated, and you’re ready to shop.

You can disable notifications and switch accounts in your Cash Back Button Settings.

To open Cash Back Button Settings:

1.  Select the Button icon in your browser's toolbar.
2.  Select Settings at the bottom left of the drop-down that appears.

If you want to turn off the Cash Back notification you see when you visit a site, check the box that says Do not display Activation Hover on these sites. Enter the URLs of sites where you want to turn off Cash Back notifications. When you’re done, select Save.

If multiple people use your device and you need to switch accounts, select Not You? next to your email address to sign out. Then sign in with another account.

If multiple people use your device and you need to switch accounts, you can change it in Settings:

1.  Select the Cash Back Button icon in your browser toolbar.
2.  Select Settings at the bottom left of the drop-down that appears.
3.  To sign out, select Not You? next to your email address. Then sign in with another account.

**Are e-gift cards purchased from Rakuten refundable?** 

Once you purchase an e-gift card, it cannot be returned.

**What happens if my order didn't go through?**

You may see a pending charge on your credit card statement. Don't worry, this will be reversed within 3-5 business days and your credit card will not be charged. For help with pending charges, reach out to the credit card company you used for your order.

**How are e-gift cards delivered?**

We’ll send you an order confirmation email with a link to the e-gift card details. There you will find the full e-gift card number and PIN for making purchases online, and the barcode for purchasing in stores. The e-gift card details page will also have more instructions for use.

If you don’t see the order confirmation email in your inbox, please check your spam folder. If you’re still having trouble, you can contact Member Services and provide either the Shopping Trip Number (go to My Account, then Shopping Trips) or the Order Number (go to My Account, then Cash Back Balance).

**How long do e-gift card deliveries take?**

In most cases, e-gift cards will be delivered to your email within a few minutes of purchasing. Check your spam folder if you do not see a redemption email in your inbox shortly after purchase. In rare cases, delivery can take up to 48 hours, but we promise to let you know.

**Do e-gift cards expire or have any fees?**

Rakuten does not charge any fees for purchasing e-gift cards. Most e-gift cards do not have expiration dates, but that may vary by store. We recommend referring to the terms and conditions set by the store, available on the e-gift card details page. You can find a link to the details page in your order confirmation email.

**Where can e-gift cards be used?**

Most e-gift cards can be used at the store’s retail locations and online at the store’s website. E-gift card redemption methods may vary, so please refer to the terms and conditions set by the store, available on the e-gift card details page. You can find a link to the details page in your order confirmation email.

**What forms of payment are accepted?**

We accept Visa, American Express and Mastercard credit cards registered to billing addresses in the United States. If you’re using a card that has been added to your Rakuten account and enabled for In-Store Cash Back, you may be prompted to update your billing details.

**How will my e-gift card purchase be processed?**

Credit card payments are processed by one of the largest global gift card providers through its secure, encrypted system. Your e-gift card purchase will appear as “CS \*RAKUTEN.COM GFTCD” on your credit card statement.

Welcome to Rakuten! If you’re new here, you probably have a few questions. We’re here to help!

How do I get my Welcome Bonus?

We’ll send your Welcome Bonus after you complete these 3 steps:

**1\. Sign up for a new account.**

**2\. Shop through Rakuten** to make a qualifying purchase of at least $25 within 90 days of becoming a member.

Heads up, sometimes it takes some time for stores to confirm your purchase with us. You can always check the status in your [Cash Back Balance.](https://www.rakuten.com/pending-cash-back.htm)

**3\. Choose how you want to get paid** in [Account Settings.](https://www.rakuten.com/account-settings.htm)

**Important!** Make sure you have your mailing address on file. For security reasons, we need your address to pay you (to make sure it’s actually you).

After you complete all 3 steps, we’ll send your Welcome Bonus. You’ll also get an email letting you know your money is on its way via the payment method you selected.

**Want to check the status of your bonus?** [Track My Welcome Bonus](https://www.rakuten.com/help/track-welcome-bonus)

How does Rakuten work?

We make it super easy to get Cash Back on stuff you were going to buy anyway.

**STEP 1**

Get the [App](https://www.rakuten.com/mobile.htm?eeid=27307&_branch_match_id=603336541095947721) or add our [browser extension](https://www.rakuten.com/button.htm) for the best Rakuten experience, Or, go to [Rakuten.com](https://www.rakuten.com/) on your desktop or mobile device.

**STEP 2**

Shop at your favorite stores. We have more than 3,500 to choose from, including ride-sharing apps, restaurants, travel sites and subscriptions.

**STEP 3**

Get paid! After you get your Welcome Bonus, we’ll put you on our [quarterly payment schedule.](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/getting-your-rakuten-cash-back-payments-360002117667) That means you’ll get your Cash Back payment every 3 months in February, May, August and November, as long as your [Cash Back Balance](https://www.rakuten.com/) is at least $5.

**Heads up!** It can take some time for a store to confirm your purchase with us. And for Travel, you’ll earn Cash Back after the trip is completed. For specific timing info, go to the store page on [Rakuten.com](https://www.rakuten.com/pending-cash-back.htm) and look for **Posting Time** under Cash Back Terms.

How does Rakuten make money?

We know, it seems too good to be true. Here’s the deal: Stores pay us a commission for sending you their way. We share that commission with you as Cash Back. Everyone wins!

Still have questions? [Contact Us](https://www.rakuten.com/help/other-questions)

Please carefully read these Rakuten Cash Back Button Terms before installing or using the Rakuten Cash Back Button or enabling similar features on your mobile device via our mobile app (also referred to herein as our “browser extension”). These Rakuten Cash Back Button Terms, together with the [Rakuten.com Terms and Conditions](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/terms-conditions-360002101608) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/privacy-policy-360002101688), which are hereby incorporated by reference, form a legally binding agreement (collectively, the “Agreement”) that governs your use of the browser extension provided by Ebates Performance Marketing, Inc. dba Rakuten Rewards (“Rakuten,” “we,” or “us”). By clicking the “Add to” or “Install” or similar buttons (as applicable), or by installing, activating, enabling, clicking, using, or otherwise accessing the browser extension, you acknowledge and accept the disclosures herein and agree to be bound by the Agreement. If you do not wish to be bound by the Agreement, do not click “Add” or “Install” and do not install, activate, enable, access, click, or otherwise use the browser extension.

**1\. Cash Back Shopping.** The browser extension is made available to enhance your shopping experience with www.rakuten.com by providing you with relevant offers and references displayed on your browser. When you visit certain sites, the browser extension may display Cash Back shopping opportunities and prompt you to start your Cash Back shopping session via www.rakuten.com. The browser extension may also alert you of a deal or offer available through www.rakuten.com with respect to a product or brand appearing in your search results or on other pages you visit across the web, and prompt you to start a shopping session at one of our merchants. If you start a shopping session using the browser extension, it will set a cookie (or other similar tracking technologies) on your device through our affiliate network for the purpose of tracking your shopping session and crediting your Cash Back reward — just as if you had begun your shopping experience via any of our links to merchant sites on www.rakuten.com. Please note, however, that if cookies or other similar tracking devices from other affiliate marketing companies related to that merchant are already present on your computer, the browser extension will not automatically overwrite those cookies or shopping session but may still offer you the ability to start a Cash Back shopping session when you arrive at a merchant’s website.

**2\. Data Collection and Usage.** When you are interacting with the browser extension, we will collect information about the coupons, deals, merchants, products, and offers you click on. The browser extension also has some functionality that does not depend upon your interaction with it. By installing our browser extension, you enable Rakuten to automatically collect information on the pages you visit on your browser so that we can surface relevant offers, such as when Cash Back or better deals are available with our merchants. In addition, the Rakuten Cash Back Button may alert you of a deal or offer available that you had previously selected but had not purchased on a merchant site. Our browser extension may also collect information on the results pages of any searches you make so it can surface offers and deals where they are relevant (for example, we may display a Cash Back offer within a search engine results page that is related to those search results or a dining offer on a restaurant review website). We may also collect information about your shopping behavior for internal testing purposes. Information collected by the browser extension for these purposes may include date and time of use, browser type, browser version, URLs of web pages visited, general information about the visited web page, product searches, product search results, information about products added to cart, and other product information. The browser extension may also collect and use data, such as the order contents and order total, from order confirmation pages so we may confirm your Cash Back faster and more reliably. We do not intentionally collect nor use other types of information that may be included on a merchant’s order confirmation page, such as your address or partial payment information, although this information may be incidentally captured to the limited extent it is displayed by the merchant. Any data collected by the browser extension will be used, stored, and/or disclosed in accordance with this Rakuten Cash Back Button Privacy Notice and our Privacy Policy (set forth at www.rakuten.com/privacy).

**3\. Your choices.** You may turn off certain browser extension activities by visiting the “Settings” option within the browser extension. You may also turn off all data collection by uninstalling or disabling the browser extension.

**4\. Updates.** We may update the browser extension when a new version is released or when new features are added. These updates occur automatically, but we will update this Rakuten Cash Back Button Privacy Notice in the event of a material change in the information being collected or a new use for collected information that is materially different from the uses described herein. We reserve the right to modify or add features or functions to the browser extension but have no obligation to make available to you any subsequent versions or new features that may be included in some versions of the browser extension.

**5\. Third Party Components.** Attribution notices for third party software that may be contained in portions of the browser extension are available [here](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/third-party-software-notices-and-information-360052819914).

Updated: October 17, 2023

To get paid, make sure you:

1\. **Add your address**. We use your mailing address to verify your identity (even if you’re getting paid via PayPal or American Express Membership Rewards® Points). On our website, you can add your address in Account Settings. If you’re using the App, go to Account then Choose How to Get Paid.

2\. **Earn at least $5.01**. You need minimum confirmed earnings of $5.01 Cash Back before the next payment date to get paid. Cash Back must be confirmed by the store before the payment date to be included in your check or PayPal payment. If your Cash Back Balance is $5.00 or less, it will carry over to the next payment date.

Getting Paid

You’ll be paid for any confirmed Cash Back, bonuses and other rewards via the payment method you selected (check or PayPal) every three months. The time it takes for Cash Back to be confirmed depends on several factors, including the store, store policy, reporting schedule, exclusions and returns.

Rakuten Payment Dates:

*   February 15
*   May 15
*   August 15
*   November 15

Cash Back Balance

Your Cash Back Balance reflects your current earnings, including both pending and confirmed Cash Back. The time it takes for Cash Back to be confirmed depends on several factors, including the store, store policy, reporting schedule, exclusions and returns. For more details, go to [Cash Back Balance](https://www.rakuten.com/pending-cash-back.htm).

Remember, your Cash Back, bonuses and other rewards need to be confirmed by the payment date to be included.

Want to track your Cash Back payment? [Track My Big Fat Check](https://www.rakuten.com/help/track-big-fat-check)

Cash Back for Change

Your Big Fat Check can make a big impact! With our Cash Back for Change program, you can donate the change from your quarterly Cash Back payment to our partner nonprofits. All you need to do is [opt in](https://www.rakuten.com/cash-back-for-change) to start giving back.

[Learn more about Cash Back for Change](https://www.rakuten.com/help/article/donating-part-of-your-big-fat-check-to-cash-back-for-change-360058672214)

Some popular browsers have changed their settings to prevent tracking of your browsing information. These changes are intended to increase your privacy, but they also impact our ability to track your orders to give you Cash Back.

Apple’s technology is called [Intelligent Tracking Prevention 2.0](https://webkit.org/blog/8311/intelligent-tracking-prevention-2-0/), and it affects the Safari browser for both MacOS and iOS (Mac, iPhone and iPad). Technical details can be found [here.](https://webkit.org/blog/8311/intelligent-tracking-prevention-2-0/)

While most of our store partners have made the necessary changes to ensure your orders are tracked and you receive Cash Back, some are still working on it. In those cases, tracking may be blocked when using this browser.

**How to tell which store websites are blocked by the browser**

To see whether a store’s tracking is blocked by the browser, visit the store’s page on Rakuten. We’ll let you know if there’s a tracking problem. Otherwise, just shop as you normally would to continue to earn Cash Back.

**What to do if a store doesn’t offer Cash Back in your mobile browser**

If a store doesn’t offer Cash Back in the browser you’re using on your mobile device, we recommend using [the Rakuten App](https://go.ebat.es/e/MsaN8fSJvQ) to shop at that store.

**What to do if a store doesn’t offer Cash Back on your mobile device**

If a store doesn’t offer Cash Back on your mobile device, we recommend shopping on desktop using the Chrome browser.

**What to do if a store doesn’t offer Cash Back in your desktop browser**

If a store doesn’t offer Cash Back in the browser you’re using on desktop, we recommend using the Chrome browser.

Still stuck? [Contact us](https://www.rakuten.com/help/other-questions).
